plot outline: 400 is a film centered around an inner city, young college student,who runs track. Through his triumphs & success, he causes his own pain & almost his demise. However,what people don't know,is where he comes from & the hardships he has had to endure.
plot: _400_ (qv) is a film centered around an inner city, young college student,who runs track. Through his triumphs & success, he causes his own pain & almost his demise. However,what people don't know,is where he comes from & the hardships he has had to endure.::Sean Johnson
